# What is the speed of light? (300000km/s)
s = int(input())

while s != 300000:    # Jab tak sahi answer nhi mil jata tab code runs from this to next 2 lines continuosly
    print("Incoreect,please try again")
    s = int(input())
print("Correct Answer")

n = abs(int(input("Enter the number:"))) 
i = 1         # no. of digits
while n > 9:
    n = n//10
    i = i + 1
print(i)
source.23fdbe1c:
num = abs(int(input()))
rev = num%10
num = num//10
while num > 0:
    r = num%10
    num = num//10
    rev = rev*10 + r
if num > 0:
    print(rev)
else:
    print (rev - 2*rev)
source.395d4721:
# Find the pallindrone (12321 , 34843 , 9357539 are pallindrone)
num = abs(int(input()))
rev = num%10
num = num//10
while num > 0:
    r = num%10
    num = num//10
    rev = rev*10 + r
if num < 0:
    rev - 2*rev
if num == rev:
    print("Palindrone")
else:
    print("Not Palindrone")
